channel.title: Custom npc (Armour is loaded, npc itself isn't)
channel.description:
Hello!
I don't know if someone knows about this? But i would really love you if you helped me :o With some help from someone i finally managed to get the npc in my game, i used npc id 1 for it, and i can see the armour, but the npc that belongs in the armour set is invisible?
Also, just wondering, my npc anims are fucked :p The whip animation is very strange and walk animation also, it's standing is very unrealistic, does it have to do with the fact there's no npc in the armour? (Maybe a really dumb question) :p
Greetz Qeruina
